text: wow fairy tales
[Music]
from the creation of this world when
mankind had just appeared the definition
of seasons was not really clear
at that time the weather changed without
any regulations
it was sunny in the morning rainy at
noon the wind and the hurricanes
appeared in the afternoon and in the
evening the snow storm ruled the world
with that severe weather no creature
could develop the plants were barren
everywhere making everyone so miserable
how could we live on with this weather
yeah we cannot do anything our plants
are barren animals are dying what can we
do now
only god can help us now
at that time in a far away kingdom there
lived a poor but kind man named robert
after hearing the lamentations of the
villagers he determined to go find the
way to the sky to help his villagers
i have to do something to help them
right only god knows how to help my
villagers
then the young man started his journey
to heaven however no one knew where
heaven was
he decided to climb up to the top of the
highest mountain in the region to find
the way to heaven
robert kept on climbing but he couldn't
get to the top
he was really exhausted after going
halfway he had to sit down and take a
rest
suddenly he saw an old beggar man who
was faint from hunger and thirst
with his kind heart he immediately ran
towards the old man and took care of him
after being taken care of by robert for
a while the old man finally revived
thank you kind man without you i really
don't know what to do
it's nothing everyone in my situation
would do the same but why are you here
in the middle of this high mountain
the plants are all barren down there
even the animals cannot live i have to
come here to get something to eat but i
haven't got anything for two days and
how about you why are you here
i want to get to the top of this
mountain to find the way to heaven
asking the god to help my villagers
escape from their miserable life
you're really kind young man i don't
have much but maybe this magical
beanstalk can help you
you only need to sew it to the ground
after reaching the top of this mountain
it will show you the way to heaven
thank you so much it's really great
after many struggles robert finally got
to the top of the highest mountain
he remembered the old man's words then
he tried to sew the bean seed to the
ground
magic really happened the magic beans
grew up so fast turning into a giant
tree which led to the sky
robert was really happy he immediately
climbed up to the tree to find the way
to heaven and meet the god
robert got to heaven in front of his
eyes there was a magnificent castle
hiding behind the beautiful clouds
[Music]
robert happily went to the gate of the
castle and knocked on the door
[Music]
suddenly the door opened by itself
robert curiously went inside
he kept on going until he got to the
first room of this castle
inside there were plenty of beautiful
flowers flourishing plants and the
animals were singing together
there was a fairy and green dress
waiting for
hello young boy nice to meet you what
are you doing here
hello i'm robert i'm here to find a way
to help my villagers escape from the
miserable condition the weather down
there is so severe all the plants are
not able to grow normally
really you are so kind you must overcome
many struggles before getting here
how about visiting my garden for a while
you can take a little rest then continue
your journey is that okay
thank you that's my honor
after that the fairy took robert to
visit her garden where she had splendid
flowers with flourishing fruit trees
making him so lusty that he forgot to
continue his journey
no it's not right i came here to see the
god don't spend too much time here the
villagers are waiting for me
i'm really sorry but i have to go now my
villagers are waiting for me after
completing the task i will surely come
back to visit you
it's okay when you stay here a little
bit more there will be lots of exciting
things waiting for you ahead
i'm really sorry but the longer i stay
here the more miserable situation my
villagers will have to face i cannot let
them down so i have to go now
what a determining man
that's okay i won't keep you here
anymore
after that she took a green branch out
and gave it to robert
here is my gift for your determinations
when you have some troubles it can help
you
thank you so much hope to see you again
and robert continued his journey
this time he came to a room full of red
color the air there was really hot it
seemed like everything in this room
could be burned in just a few seconds
who are you what are you here for
hello i'm robert i came here to find a
way to help our villagers who are really
miserable now
good i am so lonely now i need someone
to befriend with me you will have to
stay here i won't allow you to go
anywhere
but
no buts if you don't do it i will burn
you
robert was really frightened he thought
about the way to escape from this room
then he tried to talk with the fairy in
the red dress
the weather in here is too hot is there
any way to cool it down
don't ask too much you can go anywhere
but you are not allowed to leave this
room
why is that and only you live in this
room
because i want so there were many
creatures here before but they all left
me how treacherous they are
robert gradually got everything he kept
on talking with the girl to find a way
to leave this room
have you ever thought that because you
are so hot tempered that no one dared to
stay with you
why because of me i didn't do anything
you are really hot tempered making
everyone scared of you
i used to be like that but luckily i
found a way to change myself
every time when i get angry i just need
to sit there and calm down then think
about the happy moments in life then my
mood will be much better why don't you
try it
hearing those reasonable words the fairy
tried to sit down and thought about her
best moments in life
as a miracle the air inside the room
became less stuffy the plants started
developing and the animals gradually
came back
the fairy opened her eyes
she couldn't believe her own eyes
so wonderful
and yet i haven't thought about that
thank you so much
it's nothing i'm really glad when i can
help you now you have your friends here
please allow me to leave my villagers
are waiting for me down there it's okay
but before you go i have a gift for you
this branch can help you overcome the
next challenges on the way finding the
god
thank you so much hope to see you again
the next destination of robert's journey
was a room with cool weather there were
a lot of trees with golden leaves making
a wonderful picture
everything was so beautiful that no one
could bear to leave
just like the previous rooms there was a
fairy and a yellow dress who was waiting
for robert in the middle of the room
hello i'm robert i come hello robert i'm
the ruler of this room when you come
here you will be my guest just stay here
for a year i will warmly welcome you the
weather here is comfortable isn't it
yes everything here is so comfortable i
cannot bear to leave here however there
are many people waiting for me see you
next time what i treated you so well and
you dare to reject my invitation you
insolent
the fairy swung her hand to cast a spell
hurricane suddenly emerged it seemed
like it could throw anything on the
ground up to the sky it flew toward
robert
my god what can i do now
ah the branch from the first room
robert quickly took the green branch
from the ferry in the first room out of
his back in the blink of an eye giant
trees appeared in front of his eyes to
prevent the hurricane
i really didn't mean it i'm on my way to
find the god asking him to help my
miserable villagers if i cannot go back
in time they will be put into dangerous
troubles please forgive me i promise to
come back here right after helping them
luckily the fairy understood robert's
situation when hearing those words
she stopped casting the spell and talked
to robert
robert i am really sorry for
misunderstanding you you are so brave
just continue your journey and this is
my gift for your bravery maybe it can
help you on your own journey
as soon as she finished her last words a
yellow branch gradually flew towards
robert he took it and thanked the fairy
no problem thank you so much i will
surely come back here and visit you
remember it best luck to you
but all the things were not over yet
this time robert found another room
the weather there was so cold the ground
was blanketed with white snow making a
wonderful scene
this time there was no one waiting for
him in that room
hello is anyone here i come to find the
god
if you want to meet the god
just climb up to the highest mountain to
meet me
nothing could make robert discouraged he
determined to climb up to that mountain
however the higher he climbed the colder
he felt
robert felt like he was about to freeze
but a warmth from his bag suddenly
transmitted to robert's body it came
from the branch of the fairy in the
second room
from that moment robert was no longer
disturbed by the cold but he still had
troubles with the snowstorm even when
robert tried his best he could hardly
move on even a step
i can never go to the top of the
mountain if everything keeps going like
this
ah right i still have the branch from
the third room
after that by using this branch a
windshield was immediately created to
protect robert from the snow storm
finally after many difficulties robert
could reach the top of the mountain
there was a fairy in a blue dress
waiting for him there
robert right
you are so courageous
i'm the ruler of this room not only that
i could watch you whole journey this is
the reward for your courage
thank you so much
however do you know how to meet the god
i came here to ask him to help my
villagers
leave this room
go straight then you will be able to
meet him
finally robert got to the gate of god's
palace
an angel smiled and welcomed him
robert right
follow me the god is waiting for you
inside
robert followed the angel to enter the
palace
upon arriving robert was so astonished
when he saw the man who was sitting on
the crown he was the old man who robert
had helped on that mountain
how really surprised right
robert i'm the old man that you helped
on that mountain
my god
very good robert from the first time we
met i knew that you were a good man but
i still need to challenge you because i
want to be sure about you
after all of the challenges in those
rooms you could prove yourself as a kind
guy who is always determined to help
your villagers
thank you my god could you please help
my villagers to escape from this
situation
of course i have no reason to deny a
good deed like that
you have overcome all of the challenges
and got four branches from the fairies
you just need to go back and sew them to
the ground
everything will be solved
thank you thank you so
much that's alright you are really tired
let me bring you back
the god swung his head
cloud appeared and brought robert back
to his village
after coming home robert quickly took
the branches out and sewed them in the
ground
[Music]
from that day the world had four clear
seasons
people no longer had to suffer the
severe weather which badly affected
their life anymore
each fairy was in charge of managing one
season in three months
they could live a peaceful life focusing
on their farming and animals raising
everyone was really grateful with robert
thanks to him they had been able to live
comfortably and happily for the rest of
their
[Music]
lives fairy tales
since ancient times earth mother gaia
created all things
she was the embodiment of nature of land
water mountains forests trees
she also gave people land to live
trees to make a living get food build
houses and cure diseases
gaia lent her heart to humans to
maintain the greenness of nature people
worshipped her and built a shrine in
which there was a sapling embodying the
heart of nature and the love of gaia for
creatures
but the peaceful life did not last long
when people grew larger and more
ambitious they cut down forests polluted
water sources slaughtered animals and
neglected the shrine gaia was very angry
she caused volcanoes
earthquakes
tsunamis and many natural disasters to
ravage everywhere
she sent bats to bring down a disease
that made it difficult for people to
breathe and then caused them to die
in a small village there was a kind and
filial girl named agatha living with her
mother and grandmother
agatha's mother was unfortunately
infected and in very dire straits
agatha i'm okay i can still resist
if you love me and everyone
hurry to the shrine of gaia which is two
miles to the west
and bring the saplings there to guyana
island
that is the heart of the goddess perhaps
it is the only way to appease the
venerable motherland and save us all
agatha loved her mother very much and
wanted to stay by her side but she
couldn't watch her and everyone die
slowly she asked her grandmother and
other people to take care of her mother
and decided to go
agatha hurried to the shrine carefully
picked up the last sprout and started
the journey to guyana island she passed
through many towns witnessing mournful
children turbid rivers and streams
withered trees a sky full of dark clouds
agatha quickly crossed the forest to
soon reach guyana island where she was
stopped by a herd of wild beasts since
they had seen the light of the sprout
from agatha's pocket they wanted agatha
to hand over the sprout so that they
could save their leader beast from being
chased by humans
hey human child quickly hand over the
sprout in your pocket to our leader all
that happened to him is because of the
cruelty of you humans now only the
sprout can save his life don't hesitate
anymore quickly bring it here
the beasts kept surrounding and
threatened the little girl
please don't harm me i just want to
safely bring this living sprout to
guyana island to return it to the
goddess and save everyone from natural
disasters and raging epidemics do you
mind if i come to see your leader's
situation
hearing so and also because of the
endangered life of the leader they
immediately agreed with her
ok
we'll agree with you but if you don't
save our leader you will never be alive
to get out of this forest
they took her to the cave where the
leader was dying
entering the cave agatha was surprised
because she thought the leader beast
would look fierce and scary but turned
out to be beautiful
it was a wolf with white shining fur and
sparkling deep blue eyes
agatha looked down and saw an arrow
through its leg
it lost a lot of blood and was gradually
weakening
she gently lifted his leg to check the
wound
the animal in pain began to growl at her
let me see the wound for you it is quite
serious but you can rest assured just
wash it to stop the bleeding and apply a
few days of medicinal leaves no worries
because i will cure you
because she also knew a bit of medicine
agatha went to find some leaves in the
forest carefully pulled out the arrow
took clean water to wash the wound and
put medicinal leaves on the wolf
agatha patiently took care of it until
the fourth day
then the wolf recovered completely it
decided to accompany her so that she
could safely be out of the forest
it also gave her one of his fangs to
protect her along the way
agatha thank you for saving my life i
can only go with you until here so i
give you this wolf fang in the most
difficult situation it will save you the
road ahead is still dangerous
may you have peace
agatha said goodbye to the wolf and
continued to walk a little further out
of the forest in front of her was a
beach and on the other side of the coast
was the guyana island
agatha picked up dry logs from around
the shore and assembled them into a
small raft to go to guyana island
agatha was rowing the raft to the middle
of the sea when suddenly its surface
vibrated causing agatha's raft to tilt
agatha tried to keep her small raft
balanced against the waves
the waves rolled higher and higher
looking like a giant monster waiting to
swallow her
the little raft could not hold it any
longer then agatha and the raft both
fell into the ferocious waves
in the middle of the ocean agatha
gradually faded away
before she completely fainted she still
muttered to the blue sea to help her
bring the sprout of life to guyana
island dear blue sea we humans are
guilty of nature but we really know our
mistake if i die here today please help
me bring this crowd to the goddess
please save the poor people out there
when agatha was gradually sinking
suddenly her wolf bangs flashed light
and a protective film wrapped around her
to carry her to guyana island
stepping on to guyana island she was
surprised because the whole island was
so bare with only one rocky mountain
standing it was far different from the
stories about the beautiful green guyana
island that she often heard
good morning goddess gaia you beautiful
and lovely goddess
after agatha finished her words suddenly
the rocky mountain shook and turned into
a giant made of rock and lava
[Music]
look at what ungrateful humans have done
to me you cut down trees slaughter
animals destroy nature stain my heart
you deserve to receive the punishment
the giant said as she rushed to attack
agatha
[Music]
while agatha was dodging the attack she
was trying to talk to gaia in her giant
form dear goddess gaia we are very sorry
about what we have done to you everyone
is very regretful and wants to apologize
to you may you calm down and become our
beautiful and warm heart goddess gaia
once again
however anger almost made gaia lose all
her mind she created a stream of hot
lava to burn agatha
[Music]
despite the danger agatha defiantly
rushed towards gaia and hugged her
tightly gaia please come back to us
agatha's embrace seemed to awaken gaia
and the hot lava gradually disappeared
seeing so agatha slowly raised her head
to look the giant straight in the eye
she showed her sincerity to the goddess
she was surprised to see that there was
a hole in the giant's left chest so
agatha quickly put the sprout in that
hole
[Music]
trees then sprang up again on guyana
island returning its original green
touched by the bravery and kindness of
agatha the goddess allowed to stop the
natural disasters
the disease causing bats also
disappeared and the earth returned to
its original green the goddess smiled at
agatha and created a stone path through
the sea that she could easily return to
her small village on the way back agatha
found that the people had completely
recovered from their illness and were
living peacefully again the little girl
returned to her small village
seeing everyone healthy again she was
delightedly happy
when she got home and saw her mother was
well again she burst into tears and
rushed to hug her and her grandmother
since then people have started to live
in harmony with nature and no longer
slaughter or cut down forests
fairy tales
once upon a time in greece humans and
fairies still lived peacefully together
mankind worshiped the gods and built
temples everywhere
the gods were moved by this and they
ordered four fairies to help the humans
with their lives
the four fairies with different powers
had created unique flowers and fruits
for each season which made humans life
much easier among four of them there was
clara the spring fairy and she was the
most beautiful one her beauty was like
the flower in its early bloom or the
mornings do which could move even the
toughest hearts
for that reason she was noticed by chad
a giant who lived in the castle under
the albert mountain the biggest mountain
in greece
clara is so beautiful i will definitely
bring her to my home
he knew that clara and the other fairies
usually wandered in the hill near albert
mountain so he had already waited there
i'm the best that i didn't see
winter fairy won't be able to find me
here
[Music]
who are you leave me out
help
help me
the other fairies saw that but since
chad was too fast and strong they
couldn't make it to save clara
[Music]
oh what should we do now
he's too strong we cannot beat him go we
have to find someone to help
he locked her in an iron cage that was
spelled earlier which made her unable to
escape
losing clara spring was unable to reach
greece
people here had to live in misery as
winter lasted so long
witnessing everyone's suffering prince
brian decided to find out the reason
dear gods i wonder what made you guys
decide not to bring spring to greece
it's not that we don't want but because
we can't do it
[Music]
young man you want to bring spring back
here right
yes how can i help
then we can count on you
hearing the whole story and following
the fairy's guide brian rode the horse
alone to albert mountain he sneaked into
the giant's castle while he was sleeping
spring fairy
clara where are you
huh
who is that
someone help me please
thanks to her shout brian located the
room that she was locked in which was
the largest one in the castle
brian quickly went to the cage but he
could not move it
it's no use this cage was spelled by the
giant so i cannot escape
i have an idea but it would make you
feel uneasy a little bit
i don't mind it if it could help me go
out so now you will pretend to fall in
love with that giant then invite him to
drink with you then we will make him as
drunk as possible he will definitely let
you out
huh
later that night according to brian's
plan clara expressed an opposite
attitude towards chad
hey chad
isn't it too lonely to live alone in
such a cold place like this
huh
it is indeed lonely
so this is why you brought me here right
it's so poor of you
oh clara you finally understand me
isn't it clear now tonight's moon is
very beautiful
do you want to drink and watch the moon
with me
beautiful scene with a beautiful lady
the only missing thing was good wine i
will go get some it turned out that he
opened the cage and let her out so they
could drink together
hey chad
with those strong and big hands i bet
that you could easily hold a full cup of
wine
hey chad this wine is so strong can you
drink all of them
[Music]
hey chad you're such a good drinker i
admire you very much
not long after chad fell asleep as he
was too drunk
but the strong wine also affected clara
[Music]
what's wrong with you
the wine was so strong i couldn't fly
what should i do
get on my horse i will bring you home
the giant woke up and discovered that
clara disappeared
he was furious when he knew that he was
fooled hmm
somebody played a trick on me i have to
find that one at all costs right in the
night the giant followed the horse track
to the palace
not long after he saw brian with clara
riding the horse forward hey little man
you took away my beautiful clara bring
her back to me now
i don't want to live with you
it's not right
do you know that without clara people
here will have to suffer a lot since
there's no spring anymore
i don't care bring clara back to me
before this devastation everyone was
afraid clara had to show up
this place is under our protection
stop crashing things like that
you
you are on the human side
why
i am always with humans
hey human i challenge you if you win i
would never bother clara again
are you confident that you can beat me
i will give you one day to prepare
tomorrow morning i'll be here you weak
human
alright i accept
just as promised chad showed up the next
day
[Music]
chad and brian fought very fiercely
brian courageously fought with all his
strength he tried to keep spring back in
his
[Music]
hometown but with brian's strength he
could not defeat the giant with
unlimited power
this is unfair if i were as tall as you
i could beat you easily
huh no matter how big you are you will
never be my opponent watch this
it was true when he turned to human size
he was easily beaten by brian
angry at this he turned giant again and
hit brian
then he hit his back with a sword and
wounded him badly
then chad was about to finish him but
when he was about to do that his arm
tightened
turns out clara cannot stand watching
her protector in danger she used her
power to control the lyanna's that
tightened chad to stop him
sisters use your power to save people
here then the other fairies joined hand
the summer and autumn ferry controlled
earth and fire to create lava that glued
chad down while he was small earlier i
saw that there was a scar on his head
this must be his weakness
i know his weakness can you bring me to
the top of his head
the winter fairy created an ice polar to
bring bryan there
he used all of his power to jump on the
giant's head and pierced the sword
through the top of his head the giant
shouted then fell down brian also fell
down because of the wound
the fairies then cured him by their
power
[Music]
after killing the giant and curing brian
the spring and winter fairy held each
other's hand and started the season
changing ceremony
the winter's cold died down and sprouts
appeared everywhere spring had returned
to the greek's joy
[Music]
you
